Group (2022-present):
MIMIIROSE

Introduction

Yewon is a South Korean singer under Pocket7 Entertainment.

On September 1, 2022, Ye Won was revealed as a member of the girl group mimiirose under YES IM Entertainment. The group debuted on September 16, 2022, with the single "AWESOME".

On November 21, 2023, it was announced that mimiirose had parted ways with YES IM Entertainment following a mutual decision.

They were revealed to have signed an exclusive contract with Pocket7 Entertainment on March 26, 2024, continuing their activities as mimiirose with the addition of two new members.
